title.en: Indonesia's Leading Integrated EPC and Investment Company
title.id: Perusahaan EPC dan Investasi Terintegrasi Terkemuka di Indonesia

description.en: We provides comprehensive services in the areas of engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC), as well as investment opportunities across a range of sectors in Indonesia.
description.id: Kami menyediakan layanan komprehensif di bidang teknik, pengadaan, dan konstruksi (EPC), serta peluang investasi di berbagai sektor di Indonesia.

description.en: WIKA Group produly present, one of our recent and most successful project located in North Jakarta. A high-tech football stadium developed to FIFA's standards.

GESITS Electric Motorcycle is a work done by Indonesian People. Initiated as a reserach project from Sepuluh Nopember Technology Institute (ITS) and supported by Ministry of Research and Higher Education. Manufactured in PT WIKA Industri Manufaktur at Cileungsi Plant, Bogor, West Java.
This year, WIKA won many awards, including 'The Most Committed GRC Leader 2022'. WIKA continues to bring quality to every part of the company's journey.
A concrete step from WIKA to carry out social responsibility, being empowered for those around us.
